title: Juniper Networks security advisory (AV26-172)
description: On February 25, 2026, Juniper Networks published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products. Included was a critical update for the following:
products: Junos OS Evolved on PTX Series  25.4 versions prior to 25.4R1-S1-EVO, 25.4R2-EVO
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
